citeinfo.origin: Distribution of buried and exposed oyster reefs in Galveston and Trinity Bays. Based on shell surveys performed from 1954-1958 by J.G. Turney.
citeinfo.title: TX_Galveston_Bay_oysters_1958_turney
citeinfo.othercit: Distribution of buried and exposed oyster reefs in Galveston and Trinity Bays. Based on shell surveys performed from 1954-1958 by J.G. Turney.

descript.abstract: The Houston Advanced Research Center digitized the exposed oyster reefs shown on a map entitled "Distribution of buried and exposed oyster reefs in Galveston and Trinity Bays. Based on shell surveys performed from 1954-1958 by J.G. Turney." The map was found on page 28 of Galveston Bay Geology, Houston Geological Society, Compiled by Robert R. Lankford and John J.W. Rogers, 1969.
descript.purpose: Provide historic snapshot of the extent of exposed oyster reefs in Galveston Bay.

idinfo.accconst: Restriction Code: other restrictions; Other Constraints: Access constraints: None
